class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffa06e">Mortal, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">my </xhtml:span><xhtml:span style="color:#bcc0ff">Thou </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff645c">puzzlest </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">me! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p
